text: We had ordered 2 pizzas, there was so much grease on them and under the pizza. They didn't even taste like pizza. It had made me sick. Never had problems before,  doubt if we order there again. Very disappointed.

text: Whatever changes your crews been working on is paying off. We've noticed a gradual change with each order over the past couple of months. But, last night was the best! We ordered ahead online and customized 2 large pizzas...Our order was on â€¦More

text: We use their on line ordering and we LOVE it! Great food and great service!

name: Travis Crafton
text: Went to pick up my kids pizza he earned from school, I saw it ready to be handed to me but had to wait for all of the cashiers personal conversations to get done with other customers just to get handed a already completed pizza. I suggest making friends with the cashiers if you want to get served in a timely fashion.

text: I have asked multiple times, every time I order, for the crust to be cooked longer because it is always soft on the bottom. Maybe the lower burners on the oven aren't at a high enough temp. But I always end up having to fold the pizza over. â€¦More
